title: Solar Farm Generation Forecast
description: An operator needs an accurate 48-hour power generation forecast for a 100 MW solar farm.

tasks.description: Retrieve the latest cloud cover and irradiance forecasts for the solar farm's location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent fetches high-resolution weather data for the next 48 hours.

tasks.description: Check the asset management system for any planned maintenance or known outages at the farm.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all inverters are scheduled to be online.

tasks.description: Generate an hourly generation forecast (in MWh) based on the weather forecast and asset availability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a detailed generation forecast table.
